references.description: Official MCP servers examples - relevant for thoughts_tool MCP implementation patterns
Main Claude Code repository - essential for understanding Task tool implementation and agent system internals
Community collection of Claude Code subagent examples and patterns
Lightweight Zig implementation of Model Context Protocol (MCP) with compile-time validated interfaces, type-safe tool definitions, and automatic schema generation for LLM-to-tool integration

Zig programming language compiler, standard library, and toolchain - a systems programming language emphasizing robustness, optimal performance, and C/C++ interoperability with cross-compilation support
Pure Rust git implementation - evaluating as potential replacement for git2/libgit2 to solve SSH agent compatibility issues
Linear official monorepo containing GraphQL schema, TypeScript SDK, and codegen tools - essential for understanding the Linear API structure for Rust implementation
Makepad - MIT-licensed Rust UI framework with Android/Linux support, GPU-accelerated rendering
Moly - AI LLM client built with Makepad in pure Rust
Robrix - Matrix chat client built with Makepad, has working Android APK releases
Slint UI framework - declarative Rust GUI with Android/Linux support (triple-licensed)
Iced - MIT-licensed Elm-architecture Rust GUI framework
ChatGPT client built with Slint - example of streaming LLM UI in Rust
Mozilla UniFFI - generates Kotlin/Swift bindings from Rust (MPL-2.0)
AI toolkit library used by Moly - contains streaming implementation, ChatController, BotClient abstractions for LLM clients
Limbo - Turso's SQLite-compatible database written in Rust, evaluating for chat persistence in Claude client
Turso database - the branded/production version of Limbo, checking for Rust bindings and crate naming
Testing add_reference tool from PR
Just MCP server with three-tier parsing strategy (tree-sitter → CLI → regex) - reference for justfile-to-MCP tool generation
Production-ready Just MCP server using CLI wrapper approach - reference for justfile introspection and recipe execution
